articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: With new in-house models, Microsoft lays the groundwork for independence from OpenAI - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft is still deeply tied to OpenAI, but who knows what the future holds.

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: WhatsApp fixes ‘zero-click’ bug used to hack Apple users with spyware - TechCrunch
articles.description: A spyware vendor was behind a recent campaign that abused a vulnerability in WhatsApp to deliver an exploit capable of hacking into iPhones and Macs.
articles.content:
WhatsApp said on Friday that it fixed a security bug in its iOS and Mac apps that was being used to stealthily hack into the Apple devices of “specific targeted users.”
The Meta-owned messaging app … [+2726 chars]

articles.author: Josh Dinner
articles.title: NASA debuts new Orion mission control room for Artemis 2 astronaut flight around the moon (photos) - Space
articles.description: Orion is so packed with technology that the old Mission Control room needed an annex.
articles.content: With shiny new next-generation spacecraft come the complex systems required to track their technologically advanced systems. When it comes to NASA's Orion spacecraft, that need is a whole extra room … [+4116 chars]
